import{createStore,combineReducers}from'redux';import expensesReducer from'../reducers/expenses';import filtersReducer from'../reducers/filters';// Store creation
var configureStore=function configureStore(){var store=createStore(combineReducers({expenses:expensesReducer,filters:filtersReducer}),window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__&&window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION__());return store;};export default configureStore;
